name: high top
description:
The game is set in the near future, and follows a group of students who are in a renegade robotics project that uses nanotechnology to modify themselves to perform exceptional feats of super speed, agility and strength.
In the game, students break into a classroom where The Lord of the Rings actor Peter Jackson is teaching his students Ripley's Believe It or Not. This year, Outhouse Media's 'High Top' video game is set to debut at the BAFTA festival on Saturday 7 May. Peter Jackson and his students are watching The Lord of the Rings. Original Article Share This
